name: Melissa McCarthy
summary: Melissa McCarthy. Actress: The Heat. Melissa McCarthy was born in Plainfield, Illinois, to Sandra and Michael McCarthy, and was raised on her family's corn and soybean farm. She began her performing career as a stand-up comedian in New York where she appeared at the famous clubs, Stand Up New York and The Improv. She worked on her acting skills at The Actors Studio and appeared in many stage productions in...
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars | 39 wins & 111 nominations total
